QuestData.Title: Save the Wee Animals
QuestData.Description: Help us, $c! The forest is aflame, and the wee animals can't find their way out. They can't fight for themselves, with their teeny-tiny little teeth and their soft furry paws! They're fluffy and sweet.$B$BThey have wet little noses!$B$BIf you don't save them, I don't want to even THINK about it.$B$B<She slaps her palms over her eyes.>$B$BI'm not thinking!
QuestData.LogDescription: Go into the Inferno and rescue any combination of 10 Panicked Bunnies or Terrified Squirrels.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you save the wee animals? And their wee little friends?
QuestData.RewardText: Squueeeee!$B$BDid the nice $gMr.:Mrs.; $c pull you from the flames, little friend? You're safe now!$B$BHooray!
